catalyst: The catalyst used in the experiment is Au-TiO2, specifically Au-TiO2 (O), Au-TiO2 (T), and Au-TiO2 (S).
lamp: The lamp used in the experiment is a 300 W Xe lamp (PLS-SXE 300D/300DUV, Beijing Perfectlight, China).
reaction medium: The reaction medium used in the experiment is water (H2O).
reactor type: The reactor type for the experiment is a 100 mL reactor purchased from Beijing Perfectlight Company (China).
